name: Pixel Paths
description:
Get the vehicles to their goal by completing their paths!

Left click a path tile to rotate it 90 degrees.

Made for Miz Jam 1

Notes

I only managed to spend around 15 hours on this so it only has a handful of levels and is missing a bunch of things I wanted to add but the core gameplay is there. I'm just happy I finally managed to release something after all these years!
